product.short-description: Denim skirt with a high-rise waist with button & zip closure to the front. Topped with classic 5-pocket detailing. A short-length with notched accent.
product.long-description:
• Stretch denim.
  • Colored denim wash.
  • Exposed button closure.
  • Classic five-pocket styling.
  • Raw hem.
